summary:
## Foreign Exchange Market (Forex)

The foreign exchange market (Forex) is where people buy and sell different currencies. It's huge, the biggest market in the world! Banks and other big companies use it to trade currencies, like exchanging U.S. Dollars for Euros.

Forex helps businesses buy things from other countries and allows people to invest in different currencies. It's mostly unregulated because it's global and happens all the time.

In 2022, people traded about $7.5 trillion worth of currencies every day!
title: Foreign exchange market
